summary:
PlayNity - Play to earn model

 PlayNity Academy - The better you are, the more you earn

 PlayNity Token - By buying & staking our token you can earn from our players earnings

 PlayNity DAO - Thanks to deployed PlayNity DAO solutions, it requires only willingness and minimum effort by all participants

 PlayNity Guild - Earn money by playing P2E games without initial investment

 PlayNity NFT - PlayNity DAO solutions can boost every player income

 PlayNity Games - Play in different games to maximize your earnings

 PlayNity Team - Our team members

 PlayNity Partners - Partnerships
